title: Ruth Edwards Returns with Ambitions: ‘I Think I can be Even Better’
content:
After a two-year hiatus, US star is hoping to pick up where she left off: 'I didn't want to return to the peloton to ride bikes and have fun. I want to compete.'

Read the full article at Ruth Edwards Returns with Ambitions: ‘I Think I can be Even Better’ on Velo.
author: ahood
